name: Tongyuan Bai
department: ICL Group, School of Artificial Intelligence
bio: I am a research scholar specializing in artificial intelligence and computer graphics. My current work focuses on generating 3D spatial layouts for indoor and outdoor environments using diffusion models and large language models. My research vision is to automate the creation of diverse 3D scene assets, particularly those that exist solely in the realm of human imagination, contributing to the development of richly immersive and limitless virtual worlds.

experience.description: Worked on FPGA-based radar systems development and signal processing.
Worked as a backend engineer intern in the Overseas Recommendation System team, responsible for backend development.
